title: Beach Camping
content: Set up tents on golden beaches and enjoy nights caressed by ocean breezes. Activities include: beach volleyball tournament, bonfire party, sunrise yoga, seafood barbecue, beach walking, stargazing. Perfect for outdoor enthusiasts of all ages to experience the most authentic ocean camping life.

title: Mountain Climbing
content: Challenge steep peaks and conquer natural heights. Activities include: professional climbing guidance, safety equipment usage, team collaboration training, summit viewing, photography recording, descent techniques. Perfect for adventurers with good physical condition to experience the achievement of conquering peaks.

title: Mountain Crossing
content: Traverse rugged mountain ranges and challenge extreme heights. Activities include: high altitude adaptation training, professional guide leadership, extreme challenge projects, team mutual assistance, summit camping, sunrise viewing. Perfect for experienced outdoor adventurers to experience the most thrilling mountain adventures.
